nodes.text: Ratoog was a Gamorrean male who lived on the planet Derilyn during the reign of the Galactic Empire. He was a member of the Friends of Paran, an anti-Imperial resistance group, and he served the organization as a droid and computer specialist. Ratoog wore a linguibox on his belt, which translated his speech from Gamorrean to Basic. He was also a successful sabacc player.
